notification_security.upem.fr.securitynotification.home

Interface FragmentReceiver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionFragment, FragmentReceiver.BaseFragmentReceiver, HomeAlertedFragment, HomeIdleFragment, ParameterFragment, SignUpFragment, SplashFragment

    public interface FragmentReceiver
    A FragmentReceiver can receive as a delegate a specific intent. Which corresponds to its action, returned by its getFilteredAction method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FragmentReceiver.BaseFragmentReceiver
      Abstract Fragment factorizing and handling all network verifications during exchanges with the NetworkService and a HomeActivity's fragment.
      static class  FragmentReceiver.FragmentState
      A FragmentState tells if the current enclosing Fragment is waiting for a network result or not.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFilteredAction()
      Returns the filter action filtered by the current FragmentReceiver.
      boolean onBackPressed()
      Back button is pressed.
      void onReceiveNetworkIntent(Intent intent)
      Receives the given intent from NetworkService to process.

    • Method Detail

      • onReceiveNetworkIntent

        void onReceiveNetworkIntent(Intent intent)
        Receives the given intent from NetworkService to process. If the receiver is not in WAITING_NETWORK_RESULT, it will discard the call.
        Parameters:
        intent - the intent to process.

      • getFilteredAction

        java.lang.String getFilteredAction()
        Returns the filter action filtered by the current FragmentReceiver. It only listen to this action.
        Returns:
        the filter action filtered.

      • onBackPressed

        boolean onBackPressed()
        Back button is pressed. return true if the action is captured, false otherwise.
